descriptionHtml:
[url=https://flic.kr/p/pcSfwv][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3889/15230491585_8e7e40b6c2_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]

[youtube]p_nKABjeBVg[/youtube] [youtube]i1nkI_AVa58[/youtube]

This is an idea I had quite a while ago, but always seemed to get put on the back burner. I got busy with other projects and just life in general, plus I wanted to take a break from body textures and branch out into other types of mods. Now, several months after it's original inception Glorious Perspiration finaly sees the light of day.

So, what is it? Well, put simply it's a set of body textures designed to give the illusion of three dimensional sweat.

This mod was originally inspired by xs2reality's "Sporty Sexy Sweat" mod. He did a fantastic job with his textures and the fact that he'd only edited the s.dds files meant they were compatible with just about any body texture set.  Still though, I couldn't see why no one had taken the idea to it's next logical step.

So, building on the idea xs's original mod I set about making a more substantial set of textures by applying the appropriate layers to both the surface textures and s.dds files as well as the normal maps.

The downside of all this is that unlike Xs's mod, this mod requires you to replace most your characters textures. For this reason I have included the resource files in the optional files section for editing and modding purposes.

I hope you enjoy the mod and don't forget to endorse it if you do.


[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]

Download the file, unzip and copy/paste the contents to your skyrim data directory. Click yes when asked to overwrite.

At present the mod only replaces the diffuse and specular maps. So you can can use any set of normal maps you wish without fear of incompatibility.


Bugs/Incompatibilities:

None that I have found.
Please report any bugs or fixes.


[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]FAQ's:[/b][/color][/size]

Q: Can I use this with custom races.
A: Yes, all custom races (even the scripted ones) use the same basic formula 
     and setup as that of the vanilla races with the largest difference being
     that custom races draw their assets (textures/meshes) from a different
     file location.  Find out where your custom races's textures are installed
     and copy/paste over them with the new textures.

Q: Do you plan on providing 7Base support.
A: UNP is 7Base support, the two body textures are compatible.

Q: Do you plan on providing support for any other body support like  
      Blessed, Dreamgirl or ADEC?
A: No, this is as much a proof of concept as it is a complete mod. I've made
     the resource files available and anyone is free to use them.

Q: I can't figure out how to install these textures.
A: They go in the "textures" folder. I'll let you figure it out from there

Q: Can you make it more shiny?
A: No. The effect is meant to be subtle but, if you don't like the current
     presets you are free to use the resource files as you see fit.

Q: Why are these files so big?
A: As with most of the textures I create, these textures are lossless which is
     to say they are not compressed in any way. This has the benefit of preser
     ving the images overall clarity and detail but also makes them much
     larger than standard textures.


[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]Future Plans:[/b][/color][/size]

At this point I don't really have much in way of future plans. The mod is not done yet and there are still some improvments I'd like to make, so as this project progresses I'll be concentrating on improving and building on what I've already created.

I've recieved a lot of feed back already on this mod and the most prevalent critisism I've recieved is that this mod would perhaps be better served as a race menu overlay or even a scripted shader effect.  Although I'm certainly not oppossed to the idea, I'd like the opportunity to perfect the assets first before I consider alternate applications.

In the meantime, the resource files are available to everyone and will be updated as the mod progresses.


[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]Mods Used:[/b][/color][/size]

Somber 3 ENB
Elwin's Pumps 2
Temptress Race
Bodyslide 2
Racemenu

[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]Similar/Recommended Mods:[/b][/color][/size]

WetBumps 1 2 3
A great mod by Cald123, takes assets from GP and combines them with a detailed (oiled) specular map.

Sporty Sexy Sweat [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?][/url]
The mod that inspired glorious perspiration, If your unwilling to commit this mods character texture overhaul I'd highly recommend this mod.


[size=3][color=#FFFF00][b]Credits:[/b][/color][/size]

xs2reality - for "Sporty Sexy Sweat"
Bethesda - for an awesome game
